page.title: 04Foxhunting
page.content: {FOXHUNTING}in this area is by the Grafton Hunt with 35 couple hounds. Their purpose is to control the number of foxes with 33 brace of fox killed last season. With 1 Huntsman, 2 Whipper-in & 4 Masters they have a field of approx. 50 on Tues. & 100 on Sat. Payment is by both subscription & field money. Some follow in cars, on bicycles & on foot where possible. Generally the farmers are in favour of hunting, many riding to hounds, any dissent coming from outside the area. Good relations are maintained by the hunt repairing any damage incurred, anyone misbehaving in the field is sent home. The hunt also provide a service collecting fallen stock. There is an active Supporters Club running Clay Pigeon Shoots, Skittles & other social events. Point to Point & Hunter Trials are also organised.
